name: Pong Game (Boban Games Studio)
description:
The whole land was overrun by evil king, KING OF BALLS !?!??!?!?
Are you able to face him as a brave hero, PADDLE MASTER ?!?!?!??!?!
Break down the evil on yourself or with your friend. Save the land from balls on their faces. Customize the game with multi-dimensional options.

Show the world who is real PADDLE MASTER !!!!!!!!

(It's simple game, nothing special, but I hope you will enjoy. You probably wouldn't but hope never dies.)
